system.description:
You see more than any other. You see the truth. You see the future. You see all.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Oracle, you must earn the Fellowship of the Harbingers.

The Oracle starts with Sights Unseen.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.oL0P8QR52eCjY4Yq]{SIGHTS UNSEEN}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.w1hdFS4sFSc5KrSw]{BEND FATE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.3Yd8ggjcYOrnPR5E]{CASSANDRA, CASSANDRA}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.Fj3SlwDJjRfsEDtW]{INSIGHT}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.UPqDvKf1pEYFynHY]{MIND READER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.oracle.Item.SMjZ7rpNAlQz4tmQ]{PROPHETIC BONDS}

advancements.name: Take the Harbinger's Core Moves other than Doom and Gloom (Doomed Soul, Do Not Trifle With Wizards, and Wizardry). Your Doom stat is +2. If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
